trans-unit.source: This is a blocking issue that will prevent the database migration from succeeding.
trans-unit.target: Este é um problema de bloqueio que impedirá o êxito da migração do banco de dados.

trans-unit.source:
We are assessing the databases in your SQL server instance {0} to identify the right Azure SQL target.
This may take some time.
trans-unit.target:
Estamos avaliando os bancos de dados na instância do SQL Server {0} para identificar o destino do SQL do Azure correto.
Isso pode levar algum tempo.

trans-unit.source: Based on the assessment results, all {0} of your database(s) in an online state can be migrated to Azure SQL.
trans-unit.target: Based on the assessment results, all {0} of your database(s) in an online state can be migrated to Azure SQL.

trans-unit.target: An error occurred while assessing the server '{0}'.
Escolha seu destino SQL do Azure
Instância Gerenciada de SQL do Azure (PaaS)

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS)
trans-unit.target: SQL Server na Máquina Virtual do Azure (IaaS)

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure subscription and your target Azure SQL Managed Instance
trans-unit.target: Selecionar a assinatura do Azure de alvo e sua Instância Gerenciada de SQL do Azure de alvo

trans-unit.source: Select your target Azure Subscription and your target SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine for your target.
trans-unit.target: Selecione sua Assinatura do Azure de destino e seu SQL Server de destino na Máquina Virtual do Azure para seu destino.

trans-unit.source: To migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance (PaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).
trans-unit.target: To migrate to Azure SQL Managed Instance (PaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).

trans-unit.source: To migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).
trans-unit.target: To migrate to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machine (IaaS), view assessment results and select one or more database(s).

trans-unit.source: To continue, select a target database.
trans-unit.target: To continue, select a target database.

trans-unit.source: We have completed the assessment of your SQL Server Instance '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: Concluímos a avaliação da sua instância do SQL Server ' {0} '.

trans-unit.source: {0} out of {1} databases can be migrated
trans-unit.target: {0} de {1} bases de dados podem ser migradas

trans-unit.source: Databases that are not ready for migration to Azure SQL Managed Instance can be migrated to SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Os bancos de dados que não estão prontos para migração para a Instância Gerenciada de SQL do Azure podem ser migrados para o SQL Server em Máquinas Virtuais do Azure.

trans-unit.source: Select an Azure account linked to Azure Data Studio, or link one now.
trans-unit.target: Select an Azure account linked to Azure Data Studio, or link one now.

trans-unit.source: Add a linked account and then try again.
trans-unit.target: Add a linked account and then try again.

trans-unit.source: The access token for selected account '{0}' is no longer valid. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account.
trans-unit.target: The access token for selected account '{0}' is no longer valid. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the selected account '{0}'. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account. Error '{1}'
trans-unit.target: An error occurred while accessing the selected account '{0}'. Select 'Link Account' and refresh the account, or select a different account. Error '{1}'

trans-unit.source: Select the location of your database backups to use for migration.
trans-unit.target: Selecione o local de seus backups de banco de dados a serem usados ​​para migração.

trans-unit.source: My database backups are on a network share
trans-unit.target: Meus backups do banco de dados se encontram em um compartilhamento de rede

trans-unit.source: My database backups are in an Azure Storage Blob Container
trans-unit.target: Meus backups do banco de dados se encontram em um contêiner do Azure Storage Blob

trans-unit.source: Provide the network share location that contains backups and the user credentials that has read access to the share
trans-unit.target: Forneça o local do compartilhamento de rede que contém backups e as credenciais do usuário com acesso de leitura ao compartilhamento

trans-unit.source: Network share location that contains backups.
trans-unit.target: Local de compartilhamento de rede que contém backups.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the service account running the source SQL Server instance has read privileges on the network share.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que a conta de serviço que executa a instância do SQL Server de origem tenha privilégios de leitura no compartilhamento de rede.

trans-unit.source: Windows user account with read access to the network share location.
trans-unit.target: Conta de usuário do Windows com acesso de leitura ao local de compartilhamento de rede.

trans-unit.source: Provide the Azure storage account where backups will be uploaded to.
trans-unit.target: Forneça a conta de armazenamento do Azure em que os backups serão carregados.

trans-unit.source: Select a unique name for this target database
trans-unit.target: Selecione um nome exclusivo para este banco de dados de destino

trans-unit.target: Database '{0}' already exists on the target managed instance '{1}'.

trans-unit.source: Select the subscription that contains the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Selecione a assinatura que contém a conta de armazenamento.

trans-unit.source: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, choose a migration mode based on your downtime requirements.
trans-unit.target: To migrate to the Azure SQL target, choose a migration mode based on your downtime requirements.

trans-unit.source: Application downtime is limited to cutover at the end of migration.
trans-unit.target: Application downtime is limited to cutover at the end of migration.

trans-unit.source: Application downtime will start when the migration starts.
trans-unit.target: O tempo de inatividade do aplicativo será iniciado quando a migração for iniciada.

Serviço de Migração de Banco de Dados do Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing Database Migration Service as an Azure SQL target if you have created one previously, or create a new one below.
trans-unit.target: Azure Database Migration Service orchestrates database migration activities and tracks their progress. You can select an existing Database Migration Service as an Azure SQL target if you have created one previously, or create a new one below.

trans-unit.source: No Database Migration Service found. Create a new one
trans-unit.target: No Database Migration Service found. Create a new one

trans-unit.source: Select a valid Database Migration Service.
trans-unit.target: Select a valid Database Migration Service.

trans-unit.source: Select a Database Migration Service that is connected to a node.
trans-unit.target: Select a Database Migration Service that is connected to a node.
Detalhes do Serviço de Migração de Banco de Dados do Azure "{0}": `

trans-unit.source: Any existing Azure Database Migration Service in the Azure portal do not appear in Azure Data Studio. Any Database Migration Service created in Azure Data Studio will not be visible in the Azure portal yet.
trans-unit.target: Any existing Azure Database Migration Service in the Azure portal do not appear in Azure Data Studio. Any Database Migration Service created in Azure Data Studio will not be visible in the Azure portal yet.
Criar Serviço de Migração de Banco de Dados do Azure

trans-unit.source: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identifying valid backup file(s).
trans-unit.target: Enter the SQL Authentication credentials used to connect to SQL Server Instance {0}. These credentials will be used to connect to the SQL Server instance and identifying valid backup file(s).

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's self-hosted integration runtime to upload backups from on-premises network fie share to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Azure Database Migration Service leverages Azure Data Factory's self-hosted integration runtime to upload backups from on-premises network fie share to Azure.

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted integration runtime.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions below to setup self-hosted integration runtime.
Baixar e instalar o runtime de integração

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Use this key to register your integration runtime
trans-unit.target: Etapa 2: usar essa chave para registrar o seu runtime de integração

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and integration runtime
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Click on 'Test connection' button to check the connection between Azure Database Migration Service and integration runtime

trans-unit.source: Azure Database Migration Service is not registered. Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' needs to be registered with self-hosted integration runtime on any node.
trans-unit.target: Azure Database Migration Service is not registered. Azure Database Migration Service '{0}' needs to be registered with self-hosted integration runtime on any node.

trans-unit.source: Determine the migration readiness of your SQL Server instances, identify a recommended Azure SQL target, and complete the migration of your SQL Server instance to Azure SQL Managed Instance or SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines.
trans-unit.target: Determine a prontidão de migração de suas instâncias do SQL Server, identifique um destino recomendado do Azure SQL e conclua a migração de sua instância do SQL Server para a Instância Gerenciada de SQL do Azure ou SQL Server em máquinas virtuais do Azure.

trans-unit.target: Migrar a Instância do SQL Server para o SQL do Azure.

trans-unit.target: Coisas que você precisa antes de iniciar a migração:

trans-unit.source: Last applied backup files taken on
trans-unit.target: Arquivos de backup aplicados pela última vez em

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while refreshing the migration status.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao atualizar o status da migração.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while canceling the migration.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro ao cancelar a migração.

trans-unit.source: The cutover process cannot start until all the migrations are done. To return the latest file status, refresh your browser window.
trans-unit.target: The cutover process cannot start until all the migrations are done. To return the latest file status, refresh your browser window.

trans-unit.source: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
trans-unit.target: SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this migration?
trans-unit.target: Tem certeza de que deseja cancelar esta migração?

trans-unit.source: Completing cutover without restoring all the backup(s) may result in a data loss.
trans-unit.target: Completing cutover without restoring all the backup(s) may result in a data loss.

trans-unit.source: A SQL Managed Instance migration cutover to the Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose because three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. The duration of the operation depends on the size of the data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.
trans-unit.target: A SQL Managed Instance migration cutover to the Business Critical service tier can take significantly longer than General Purpose because three secondary replicas have to be seeded for Always On High Availability group. The duration of the operation depends on the size of the data. Seeding speed in 90% of cases is 220 GB/hour or higher.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps before you complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: Execute as etapas a seguir antes de concluir a substituição.

trans-unit.source: 1. Stop all incoming transactions to the source database.
trans-unit.target: 1. Stop all incoming transactions to the source database.

trans-unit.source: 2. Take a final backup of the transaction log and store it in the network share location.
trans-unit.target: 2. Take a final backup of the transaction log and store it in the network share location.

trans-unit.source: 2. Take a final differential or backup of the transaction log and store it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.
trans-unit.target: 2. Take a final differential or backup of the transaction log and store it in the Azure Storage Blob Container.

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.

trans-unit.source: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.
trans-unit.target: 3. Verify that your backup(s) have been restored on the target database. The "Log backup(s) pending restore" value should be zero.

trans-unit.source: I confirm there are no additional log backup(s) to provide and want to complete cutover.
trans-unit.target: Confirmo que não há backups de log adicionais para fornecer e desejo concluir a substituição.
Substituição em andamento para o banco de dados '{0}'

trans-unit.target: Migration is not in progress and cannot be canceled.

trans-unit.target: Nenhum backup pendente. Clique em Atualizar para verificar o status atual.
